ticket_summary: Customer Arvind Vivekanandan reports missing or delayed baggage after flight AL1013 on July 19, 2024.
email_subject: Missing/Delayed Baggage – Flight AL1013 on July 19, 2024
email_body:
Dear Customer Service Team,

I am writing to report that my baggage was either missing or delayed following my flight AL1013 on July 19, 2024. I have not received any updates regarding its status and urgently need to know when I can expect it to be delivered.

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
Arvind Vivekanandan
arvind.v@berkeley.edu
